user_input:
Create a commercial for do what u want but it gotta be creative and cool. 
        Style: Cinematic. 
        Mood: Premium. 
        Camera: Steadicam. 
        Target platform: Netflix. 
        Duration: 15s. 
        URL: https://botspot.trade/.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Is the market keeping you from your best life?

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: [excited] What if your investments worked for you?

scenes.visual_prompt: Standard cinematic presentation with natural film grain. A sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device, approximately 6 inches long, with intricate internal circuit patterns faintly visible, glowing with subtle, fluid blue holographic market data projections on its top surface. Extreme close-up shot on the device's surface texture, focusing on the micro-animations of the holographic data, centered in safe zone. Rembrandt lighting with a soft box key light positioned at 45 degrees to the device, casting dramatic shadows that define its form, subtle rim light highlights its polished edges, against a dark gradient background creating professional depth. Hollywood blockbuster color grade with deep blues and metallic silvers, rich contrast and subtle halation. Shot on Sony Venice 2 full-frame 8.6K sensor with Cooke S4 prime lenses for organic bokeh character, capturing maximum resolution and clarity on an IMAX large format sensor.
scenes.audio_prompt: AMBIANCE: Quiet hum of sophisticated electronics. SFX: Subtle, synthetic data chirps and soft holographic shimmer sounds. MUSIC MOOD: tech
scenes.motion_prompt: A smooth crane up from ground level, slowly rising to a high vantage point to dramatically reveal the full device.
scenes.subject_description: A sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device, approximately 6 inches long, featuring faintly visible intricate internal circuit patterns and subtle, fluid blue holographic market data projections on its top surface.

scenes.visual_prompt:
[CONSISTENCY CRITICAL] Feature the same Trading Bot Device from Scene 1 (A sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device, approximately 6 inches long, featuring faintly visible intricate internal circuit patterns and subtle, fluid blue holographic market data projections on its top surface.).

Standard cinematic presentation with natural film grain. The same sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device from scene 1, now centered on a clean, light-wood desk with a minimalist laptop displaying a clear, upward-trending financial graph, all within the center 80% safe zone. Medium shot, framing the device and the immediate desk environment. Golden hour soft sunlight streams through a large, sheer-curtained window, creating gentle highlights and warmth, with gentle ambient bounce fill from pristine white walls, maintaining a warm color temperature of 3200K and a shallow depth of field isolating the subject. Hollywood blockbuster color grade with enhanced golden tones and subtle lens distortion. Shot on RED 8K Monstro sensor with 16-bit color depth using a 50mm f/1.2 portrait lens for beautiful subject separation and organic sensor noise, presented in anamorphic 2.39:1 cinematic scope aspect ratio.
scenes.audio_prompt: AMBIANCE: Soft, distant city sounds, gentle breeze through window. SFX: Subtle chime of a positive market alert from the laptop. MUSIC MOOD: tech
scenes.motion_prompt: A slow dolly back from the device's detail, gradually revealing the serene home office environment.
scenes.subject_reference: the same Trading Bot Device from Scene 1 (A sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device, approximately 6 inches long, featuring faintly visible intricate internal circuit patterns and subtle, fluid blue holographic market data projections on its top surface.)

scenes.visual_prompt:
[CONSISTENCY CRITICAL] Feature the same Trading Bot Device from Scene 1 (A sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device, approximately 6 inches long, featuring faintly visible intricate internal circuit patterns and subtle, fluid blue holographic market data projections on its top surface.).

Standard cinematic presentation with natural film grain. The same sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device from scene 1, prominently placed on a pristine glass table on a high-rise balcony, overlooking a vibrant, glowing cityscape at sunset, ensuring the device is within the center 80% safe zone. Wide shot, capturing the device in the foreground and the expansive, aspirational city panorama behind it. High-key lighting, bright and airy, with soft fill light eliminating harsh shadows, colorful practical city lights visible in the background adding life and vibrancy, motivated natural sunset glow illuminates the scene creating authentic feel. Hollywood blockbuster color grade emphasizing vibrant oranges, purples, and deep blues with characteristic horizontal lens flares from a Canon CN-E anamorphic lens and natural film grain. Shot on Panavision DXL2 cinema camera for professional Hollywood production standard with a Super 35mm sensor crop for traditional cinematic look, slight halation on bright city lights.
scenes.audio_prompt: AMBIANCE: Distant, sophisticated city evening sounds, gentle evening breeze. SFX: None. MUSIC MOOD: tech
scenes.motion_prompt: A wide crane shot slowly descending from a high angle, majestically revealing the aspirational scene and the device in its context.
scenes.subject_reference: the same Trading Bot Device from Scene 1 (A sleek, minimalist, brushed titanium trading bot device, approximately 6 inches long, featuring faintly visible intricate internal circuit patterns and subtle, fluid blue holographic market data projections on its top surface.)

research_brief:
{
  "Product/Service Name": "BotSpot",
  "Core Value Proposition (USP)": "Empowers users to create and deploy AI-powered trading bots and profitable strategies in seconds, without requiring any coding knowledge.",
  "Target Audience": "Individual traders, investors, or financial enthusiasts seeking to automate their trading strategies using AI, particularly those without programming experience.",
  "Top 5 Key Features": [
    "Rapid AI Trading Agent Creation & Deployment",
    "Fully Automated Trading Execution",
    "No-Code Strategy Builder",
    "Focus on Profitable Strategy Generation",
    "24/7 Continuous Trading Bot Operation"
  ],
  "Brand Tone": "Innovative, Empowering, Accessible, Efficient, Cutting-edge",
  "Industry": "Fintech, AI, Automated Trading, Financial Technology",
  "Competitors Mentioned": "None",
  "One-Sentence Pitch": "BotSpot revolutionizes trading by allowing anyone to create and deploy AI trading agents in seconds to automatically execute profitable strategies 24/7, no coding required."
}
